greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A057167(A005132(A187922(n) - 1) - A187922(n)).
comment: Let x = A187922(n) and r = A005132(x-1) - x, by definition of A187922: r > 0 and r occurs earlier in Recamán's sequence: a(n) = A057167(r) or r = A005132(a(n)), hence A005132(x) <> r but A005132(x) = A005132(x-1) - x.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 17 2011
